title: Namaste JavaScript Handbook
description: The Namaste JavaScript Handbook - my gift to the JS community condensing Akshay Saini's 40+ hour course into text guides optimized for readability. Crafted to identify and explain key concepts. This free reference has become highly popular with over 10,000 monthly visitors deepening their JavaScript knowledge.

title: The Agency Insider
description: The Agency Insider: A Next.js v13.4 powered fusion of agency website and blogging platform, featuring MongoDB for efficient blog storage and NextAuth.js for secure user authentication. Server-side rendering and static site generation ensure optimal performance.

title: LeetBuddies
description: A chrome extension with 100+ users that helps users to follow their friends on Leetcode and see their problem-solving achievements.

title: Food Delivery WebApp
description: Food Delivery Web Application crafted with React.js, Redux, TailwindCSS, and RESTful APIs, this offers seamless reactive and responsive UI, combining a responsive interface with state management for a smooth user experience.

title: Adfree YouTube
description: A Adfree YouTube like YT Premium built using React.js, MaterialUI, and the RapidAPI YouTube API.

title: Rolling Dice Game
description: A fully responsive fun dice game called 'Pig Game' implemented using vanilla JavaScript, HTML, and CSS.

title: Online-resume
description: A fully responsive online resume made with just HTML and Vanilla CSS, Challenge from w3 schools.

title: Guess My Number
description: A project where users can play a number guessing game.
